ISSUE.TITLE: Object reference not set error in dependency registration method for data settings
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: Error come up while running nop.web the development branch Parent call stack is dependency registration in nop.web.framework. The call goes to data provider manager in nop.data and the method is get data provider

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5251 Fix the incorrected saving of specification attribute localized option value

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5252 Returned using of StartsWith to detect the install page
